In order to proceed, please enter a valid Account/Card Number in the relevant field. |!b|W|!?|REWARDS INFO |!b|W|!?|REWARDS is a tiered programme, the tier you're on depends on how much you spend. The more you spend, the more rewards you'll enjoy. All your purchases at woolworths and at www.woolworths.co.za count - just remember to swipe your card upfront with every purchase and include your cards number on your online orders TERMS AND CONDITIONS I would like to apply for a Woolworths Store Card! Please contact me on:

Mobile:

Landline: ISSUING LOAN… %s Months AUTHORISING LOAN… SUCCESS YOUR SESSION HAS EXPIRED. YOU WILL NEED TO LOGIN To apply, visit a Woolies store. Thank you for using our self service withdrawal facility. The money will be transferred to your account within 48 hours. |!b|W|!?|REWARDS STATEMENT |!b|W|!?|REWARDS SAVINGS YOUR CURRENT TIER STATUS IS YOUR CURRENT TIER STATUS VALUED LOYAL YOU'VE SAVED YOU ARE SINCE %s AWAY FROM THE VIP TIER AWAY FROM THE LOYAL TIER VIEW BARCODE BACK THE MOST REWARDING WAY TO SHOP HOW TO |!b|SAVE|!?| STATEMENT SUMMARY YEAR TO DATE WREWARDS INSTANT SAVINGS YEAR TO DATE SPEND YEAR TO DATE WREWARDS GREEN EARNED QUARTERLY VOUCHER – YEAR TO DATE VALUE EARNED MONTHLY SPEND MONTHLY EARN QUARTERLY VOUCHER – MONTHLY VALUE EARNED LOYALTY PERIOD MONTHLY WREWARDS GREEN EARNED MONTH %s YOUR TIER STATUS FOR THE MONTH INFORMATION VIEW GENERAL TERMS & CONDITIONS Swipe your Woolies or MySchool card and get an extra 10\%% off selected items. Pay with your Woolies card and get a further 5\%%. Invitations to preview sales WRewards Green Free WMagazine Exclusive WRewards savings vouchers throughout the year Birthday savings voucher The WRewards year is calculated from the first Monday of each financial year of Woolworths which commences at the end of June or at the beginning of July and comes to an end on the last Sunday of the Woolworths financial year 12 (twelve) months later. Your spend updates are refreshed on the 12th day after each specified month end date. Your WRewards tier status is updated at the end of each month. TODAY W TODAY PRODUCTS STORES STORES NEARBY WREWARDS MY ACCOUNTS INCREASE LIMIT transactions APPLY NOW Woolworths financial services The benefits: Free Taste magazines Woolworths Black Credit cardholders you’ll receive a monthly voucher for a free TASTE magazine Free coffee You’ll receive a free coffee or tea at any Woolworths Café, To Go or Tapas Bar twice a month. Free online delivery Woolworths VIP Black Credit cardholders get free online delivery. Simply link your Black Credit Card to your online profile. Shop anywhere Your Woolworths Credit Card is internationally recognised and accepted at 29 million outlets around the world wherever you see the Visa sign. To qualify, you have to: Bring the following when you collect your Store Card: •Avalid South African ID 
•Your latest three payslips or your last three months’ bank statements 
•Proof of residence in the form of a recent utility bill or your original bank statements dated within the last three months Cash when you need it: Funds within 48 hours Once your application has been approved the cash will be in your account within 48 hours. Easy access Withdraw funds 24/7 in the app using the personal loan withdrawal. Interest charged Interest will be charged according to the National Credit Act (NCA) and will never exceed the maximum allowed by the NCA. The interest rate charged is a variable interest rate that is linked to the Repo Rate, which may change from time to time. •Be 18 or older 
•Have a valid South African ID 
•Earn a minimum of R2 000 per month 
•Provide your latest three payslips or your last three months’ bank statements Have your own bank account WRewards gives you more As a Woolworths Store Cardholder, you’re automatically part of our WRewards programme. That means you’ll get exclusive access to great benefits and special offers on selected WRewards items. Make a difference Link your Store Card to our MySchool MyVillage MyPlanet fundraising programme and we'll donate up to 1% of the value of every Woolworths purchase you make to the organisation of your choice. You're in control With a Woolworths Store Card you decide how much you want to repay each month and your preferred payment method. Easy payment methods You could pay your account using one of the following methods: It’s Convenient f • 	 Be 18 or older 
• 	 Have a valid RSA ID number 
• 	 Earn a minimum of R2000 per month PLEASE ENTER THE AMOUNT YOU WOULD LIKE TO WITHDRAW: PLEASE CONFIRM YOUR LOAN

The new Woolies app gives you easy access to fashion trends, recipes, stores, account information and so much more. See how much you’ve saved, track your tier status and access all your vouchers. Conveniently view your available funds, next payment due, recent transactions and so much more. Create a profile or use your existing Woolies online sign in to get started. Your sign in details will be the same on the app, mobi site and website. welcome WRewards at a glance Financial services GET STARTED Cannot connect to server km Search by Store or Location SKIP

Hello World from section: %1$d Credit Limit Amount Select your bank R60 000 Other I agree that Woolworths Financial Services may request and receive three months of my bank statements from my bank or any third party at any time as proof of income. DO YOU CONFIRM THAT ALL INFORMATION SUPPLIED IS CORRECT? Other Expenses Monthly Credit Payments Maintenance Expenses Rental Payments Mortgage Payments Additional Monthly Income Net Monthly Income Gross Monthly Income YES No ACCOUNT TYPE COMPLETE PROCESS Credit limit increase
request received Thanks for your patience – your application is being processed and we will be in contact with you within two working days. Back to my accounts proof of income submit your documents via: EMAIL FAX US Take a photo of your latest 3 month bank statement or last 3 payslips, attach to email include Full Name and reference as subject line. Simply fax your documents to us at 021 407 9343. Your ID number will be your reference. SEND MAIL LOADING… Please select your bank to continue. Please capture your bank account number to continue. Please select your bank account type to continue. We will send further instructions to your email: UNFORTUNATELY WE CANNOT PROCEED Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum GOT IT Gross Monthly Income is your income before Tax/ Deductions. Your net monthly income refers to your income after tax and other deductions. You’ll find this amount on your payslip. Monthly personal income earned over and above your salary, i.e: rental, maintenance and spousal allowances etc. Your Monthly Home Loan Repayment. Rental Payment — Cost of Renting Accommodation. Monthly obligation to pay statutory child and/or spousal support etc. Monthly Instalment of creditor account i.e.: Credit Card, Personal Loan, Furniture Accounts etc. All Other Expenses, i.e.: groceries, transport, telephone/cellphone etc. All Other Expenses, i.e.: groceries,transport, telephone/cellphone etc. CREATING OFFER... Are you sure you want to log out? You will need to re-enter your username and password to log in again. EMAIL SENT TO LOADING... GETTING ACTIVE OFFER... YES-CONTINUE SENDING EMAIL... UPDATING BANK DETAIL... All fields are mandatory.
If not applicable, please enter R0. Please select whether Woolworths Financial Services can access your bank statements to continue. R How much additional credit would you like to apply for? DO ANY OF THE FOLLOWING APPLY TO YOU? I agree that Woolworths Financial Services may request and receive my confidential consumer credit information from any credit bureau or third party at any time, including obtaining a bureau score to determine my credit worthiness In order to complete your application, we require your latest 3 months’ bank statements or last 3 months payslips. Don’t have the required documents right now or need more detailed instructions? Simply click below and we will send an email to you, so you can complete the process a) Take a photo Take clear photos of your documents and email it to us at cliproofofincome@wfs.co.za. Your ID number will be your reference.
b) Attach from a drive Permission to proceed
UNFORTUNATELY WE CANNOT PROCEED We can only continue with your
application once you’ve granted us permission to access your consumer credit information.
SORRY, WE CANNOT PROCEED WITH YOUR APPLICATION Unfortunately we can’t proceed until you no longer have any of these conditions in place.
The new Woolies app gives you easy access to fashion trends, recipes, stores, account information and so much more. See how much you’ve saved, track your tier status and access all your vouchers. Conveniently view your available funds, next payment due, recent transactions and so much more. Create a profile or use your existing Woolies online sign in details to get started. Your sign in details will be the same on the app, mobi site and website. Welcome back To help us calculate how much additional credit you can qualify for, please answer a few quick and easy questions. Once you have completed this, you will need to submit proof of income in order for us to proceed with your application. Select your existing saved documents from your device and email it to us at cliproofofincome@wfs.co.za. Your ID number will be your reference. To upload your Proof of Income Documents, follow the instructions we’ve sent to your email. If you didn’t receive the email, please check your spam folder. loan withdrawal Your cash will be in your
account in 48 hours Loan request too high Loan request too low Unfortunately you do not meet the requirements for a loan of this amount. The minimum withdrawal amount is R1000
Unfortunately you do not meet the requirements for a loan of this amount. Please request a loan for a lower amount. Processing your loan...
|!b|W|!?|Rewards is our way of rewarding customers INSTANTLY.|!b|W|!?|Rewards members save millions every week. We see that your Woolies Card is not yet linked. To see how much you've saved, track your tier status and access all your vouchers, please link your Woolies Card now. LINK WOOLIES CARD JOIN WREWARDS Get more There are three tiers to WRewards - the more you spend, the more guaranteed rewards you'll enjoy. You'll start out on the Valued tier, and we'll upgrade your status automatically as you qualify for the next tier. MEMBER SWIPE AND SAVE INSTANTLY SPEND R30 000 OR MORE ANNUALLY VIP SPEND BETWEEN R10 000 - R29 999 ANNUALLY SAVINGS TO NEXT TIER SWIPE AND SAVE INSTANTLY SPEND BETWEEN R10 000 AND R29 999 PER YEAR at woolworths SPEND OVER R30 000 PER YEAR AT WOOLWORTHS OVERVIEW VOUCHERS YEAR TO DATE Tier Status WRewards Instant Savings WRewards Green Earned Quarterly Voucher Earned Year to Date Spend VALUE Minimum Spend TERMS & CONDITIONS "Expires: " "USE BEFORE " REGISTER before we get started featured promotions Are you sure you want to sign out? You will need to re-enter your username and password to sign in again. • A valid South African ID Your latest three payslips or your last three months’ bank statements

Flexible repayment terms of up to 60 months Re-use the money that’s been paid back towards your loan Low initiation and monthly service fees Easily apply to increase your limit if needed Settle your account early without penalties Make additional payments towards your loan Easily access your cash using our mobi app or our interactive voice message system
Be 18 years of age or older Have a valid South African ID Earn a minimum of R2,000.00 per month Provide your latest three payslips or your last three months’ bank statements Have a bank account in your own name Be 18 or older Have a valid RSA ID number Earn in excess of R3,000.00 per month

Wear it with jeans for easy casual flair, or with fitted chinos for a smarter update. Product Code Colour We see that your Woolies Card is not yet linked. To conveniently view your available funds, next payment due, recent transactions and so much more, please link your Woolies Card now. Get more back at Woolies Get up to 3\%% back in WRewards quarterly vouchers when shopping at Woolies. Cash When You Need It Use your Woolworths Credit Card to draw cash at any ATM displaying the Visa logo, worldwide. Pay for Fuel Pay for your fuel with your Woolies Credit Card and get up to 1\%% back in WRewards quarterly vouchers. PLUS (for Black Credit Card only) Free Taste magazine vouchers monthly 2 free coffee vouchers monthly that can be used at any Woolworths Cafe, To Go or Tapas Bar. Automatic VIP tier status for the first 12 months and free online delivery for Woolies online purchases (when you pay with your Woolies Black credit card). checked items shopping list added to shopping list Your shopping list items can be found in Accounts view shopping list shopping list empty Store Card /Credit Card and Personal Loan General enquiries, Online, WRewards, MySchool Products and instore Woolworths online Website and online shopping woolworthsblack@wfs.co.za complaints@wfs.co.za creditcard@wfs.co.za creditcard@wfs.co.za insuranceclaims@wfs.co.za payments@wfs.co.za queries@wfs.co.za income@wfs.co.za queries@wfs.co.za Fax custserv@woolworths.co.za Technical problem shop@woolworths.co.za rewards@woolworths.co.za cs@myschool.co.za 0860 100 445 ingredients Savings Since The WRewards year is calculated from the first Monday of each financial year of Woolworths which commences at the end of June or at the beginning of July and comes to an end on the last Sunday of the Woolworths financial year 12 (twelve) months later. WRewards is our way of rewarding customers INSTANTLY. WRewards members save millions every week.
